name: Plant Parrots
description:
This game is for the 7 day Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

The theme was Stronger Together.

Move your parrot around with WASD and try your best to pick up as many fruit (and parrots!) as you can using your almighty squawking ability (spacebar)! The more parrot followers you have the more powerful your squawk is but, be careful you will also move slower when squawking with more followers.

Super happy with how this turned out, I did the programming and art and music was acquired under CC0 from here. Thank you so much for playing, this is my first game on this account :D
